'''Deyou''' is an event-exclusive [[NPC]] who appeared in ''[[Alchemical Ascension]]''.

==Profile==
Deyou is a merchant from Liyue. He is introduced to the Traveler through [[Freda]]. The Traveler sells potions to him and helps his business grow.

===Appearance===
Deyou has black hair and eyes, his clothes are reminiscent of Liyue fashion and are in tones of dark blue, light grey and golden accents.

==Dialogue==
===Dialogue Set #1===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Deyou:''' Down to business. Let's talk terms of cooperation.
:;(Opens the Distributors interface)
:{{DIcon|Distributors}} Check potion requirements...
::'''Deyou:''' These are the types of potion I plan to purchase this time.
::{{Black Screen|After checking and double-checking that the potions have been carefully wrapped and packaged properly, Deyou leaves with the package.<br>He will return to the store after one operation cycle and bring the sales results with him.}}
:{{DIcon}} Maybe later...
::'''Deyou:''' Don't worry. Caution is the better part of valor — and business.
{{Dialogue End}}
